# AVAudioApplication.recordPermission.denied

**Case**

Indicates the user denies the app permission to record audio.

## Declaration

```swift
case denied
```

## Permissions

- **AVAudioApplication.recordPermission.undetermined**: Indicates the app hasn’t requested recording permission.
- **AVAudioApplication.recordPermission.granted**: Indicates the user grants the app permission to record audio.
